name: TrumpNews
0:
”Alexa, open Trump News”
”Alexa, ask Trump News what he did today”
”Alexa, ask Trump News what Trump did today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trump news
des:
You can ask this skill what Trump did today and it will respond to you by reading out today's headlines about Trump and his actions as POTUS.
With this skill you will always be informed about Trump's newest actions.

News Source: Google News top news
Icon: Donald Trump by Lorie Shaull from the Noun Project
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
